synopsis.text: Now enter the world of Keima Katsuragi, a high school student and unrivaled champion of dating sim games, known online as 'The Capturing God'. Keima's unparalleled skills allow him to conquer the hearts of every digital damsel, but his real-life persona is far from charming. His life takes a dramatic turn when he accepts a mysterious email invitation, leading to an encounter with Elsie, a lively demon-huntress from Hell. Elsie enlists Keima's help to capture rogue spirits that have escaped from Hell and hidden themselves within the hearts of girls. The only way to expel these spirits is by making the girls fall in love. With an explosive collar fastened around his neck, Keima must now utilize his gaming prowess in the real world to secure the hearts of various girls and free them from the clutches of these spirits, lest he and Elsie lose their lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
